description: Premium modification factors based on risk characteristics

modifiers.name: Loss History Credit/Debit
modifiers.content: Premium adjustment based on loss history. Excellent loss history with loss ratio under 25% earns 15% credit. Good loss history with ratio 25-40% earns 10% credit. Average loss history with ratio 40-55% is standard rate. Fair loss history with ratio 55-70% receives 10% surcharge. Poor loss history with ratio 70-100% receives 20% surcharge. Very poor history over 100% receives 30% surcharge or decline.

modifiers.name: Years in Business Credit
modifiers.content: Credit for established business operations. New business under 3 years may receive 10% new venture surcharge. 3-5 years in business is standard rate. 5-10 years in business earns 5% credit. Over 10 years earns 10% longevity credit. Over 20 years earns 15% longevity credit.

modifiers.name: Claims Frequency Surcharge
modifiers.content: Additional surcharge based on claim count regardless of severity. Zero claims in 3 years earns 5% claims-free credit. 1-2 claims in 3 years is standard rate. 3-4 claims in 3 years receives 10% frequency surcharge. 5+ claims in 3 years receives 20% frequency surcharge and possible decline.

modifiers.name: Safety Program Credit
modifiers.content: Credit for documented safety and risk management programs. Written safety manual earns 3% credit. Designated safety officer earns 2% credit. Regular safety training (quarterly minimum) earns 3% credit. OSHA compliance certification earns 2% credit. Return-to-work program earns 2% credit. Maximum combined safety credit is 10%.

modifiers.name: Fleet Size Discount
modifiers.content: Auto liability discount based on fleet size. 1-4 vehicles is standard rate. 5-9 vehicles earns 5% fleet discount. 10-24 vehicles earns 10% fleet discount. 25-49 vehicles earns 15% fleet discount. 50+ vehicles earns 20% fleet discount.

modifiers.name: Territory Factor
modifiers.content: Geographic territory adjustment. Rural areas earn 10% credit due to lower loss frequency. Suburban areas are standard rate. Urban areas receive 10% surcharge. High-risk urban (specific cities) receive 20% surcharge. Coastal wind-exposed areas receive wind deductible requirement.

modifiers.name: Deductible Credit
modifiers.content: Premium credit for higher deductibles. Standard $1,000 deductible is base rate. $2,500 deductible earns 5% credit. $5,000 deductible earns 10% credit. $10,000 deductible earns 15% credit. $25,000 deductible earns 20% credit. Higher deductibles available for large accounts.

modifiers.name: Multi-Policy Discount
modifiers.content: Discount for packaging multiple coverages. Two lines of coverage earns 5% package discount. Three lines earns 10% package discount. Four or more lines earns 15% package discount. BOP (Business Owners Policy) packaging may have additional discounts.

modifiers.name: Payment Plan Factor
modifiers.content: Adjustment based on payment method. Full pay upfront earns 5% discount. Quarterly payments are standard rate. Monthly payments add 3% for financing costs. Automatic payment (EFT) earns additional 2% credit.

modifiers.name: Professional Certification Credit
modifiers.content: Credit for industry certifications and professional designations. Licensed contractor receives 5% credit. Professional certifications (PE, CPA, etc.) earn 5% credit. Industry association membership earns 3% credit. Continuing education compliance earns 2% credit.
